headline: SPG Launches Simon+ Loyalty Program for Shoppers to Get Rewards
summary: Simon Property rolls out Simon+, a loyalty program that offers cash back and curated rewards for purchases across in-store and online.

raw.headline: SPG Launches Simon+ Loyalty Program for Shoppers to Get Rewards
